item.title: Economist/YouGov Poll Shows Widespread Trump Disapproval
item.description: Seven months into his second term, President Trump's approval ratings are underwater, according to a new poll. read more

item.title: New York AG Letitia James Continues Trump Fraud Case Appeal Amid DOJ Scrutiny
item.description: New York Attorney General Letitia James is persisting with an appeal in a business fraud case against President Trump and his company. read more
